original_text: For he rebuilt the high places that Hezekiah his father had destroyed, and he erected altars for Baal and made an Asherah, as Ahab king of Israel had done, and worshiped all the host of heaven and served them.
korean_text: 그의 아버지 히스기야가 헐어 버린 산당들을 다시 세우며 이스라엘의 왕 아합의 행위를 따라 바알을 위하여 제단을 쌓으며 아세라 목상을 만들며 하늘의 일월 성신을 경배하여 섬기며

sentences.original_text: For he rebuilt the high places
that Hezekiah his father had destroyed
and he erected altars for Baal
as Ahab king of Israel had done
and worshiped all the host of heaven
